text: Mark Vanmoerkerke (18 September 1952 â€“ 26 October 2022) was a Belgian senator and businessman. Vanmourkerke served as a member in the Belgian Senate from 1994 to 1995 for the Christian Social Party. Vanmoerkerke became an entrepreneur and was owner of the Belgian holiday park group Sunparks, succeeding his father Rudolf Vanmoerkerke. In 2018, he became a majority shareholder in real estate firm QRF City Retail.Familie Vanmoerkerke wordt referentie aandeelhouder bij Qrf City Retail, Made in West-Vlaanderen, 12 December 2018. Mark Vanmoerkerke was also an art lover and had an impressive collection that he housed in his 'Vanmoerkerke Collection'. Vanmoerkerke died on 26 October 2022, aged 70. ==References== Category:Belgian politicians Category:Belgian businesspeople Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from West Flanders Category:Place of death missing
title: Mark Vanmoerkerke
